verses.text: \w These|strong="H6213"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* words \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* covenant \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* commanded \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* children \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Moab, beside \w the|strong="H3605"\w* covenant \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* Horeb.

\w And|strong="H1419"\w* Moses called \w unto|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H7200"\w* Israel, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* said \w unto|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, \w Ye|strong="H7200"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w did|strong="H5869"\w* \w before|strong="H5869"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w in|strong="H1419"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* land \w of|strong="H5869"\w* Egypt \w unto|strong="H7200"\w* Pharaoh, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w unto|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* servants, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w unto|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* land;

\w the|strong="H8085"\w* great temptations \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w thine|strong="H5414"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w*, \w the|strong="H8085"\w* signs, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w those|strong="H8085"\w* great wonders:

\w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w hath|strong="H7272"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* given \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w an|strong="H8141"\w* heart \w to|strong="H3212"\w* know, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* eyes \w to|strong="H3212"\w* see, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* ears \w to|strong="H3212"\w* hear, \w unto|strong="H3212"\w* \w this|strong="H3212"\w* day.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w led|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* forty years \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* wilderness: \w your|strong="H3068"\w* clothes \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* waxen old \w upon|strong="H3045"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* shoe \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* waxen old \w upon|strong="H3045"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* foot.

\w Ye|strong="H3318"\w* \w have|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* eaten bread, neither \w have|strong="H4428"\w* \w ye|strong="H3318"\w* drunk wine \w or|strong="H4428"\w* strong drink: \w that|strong="H4428"\w* \w ye|strong="H3318"\w* \w might|strong="H4725"\w* know \w that|strong="H4428"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* am \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3318"\w* God.

\w And|strong="H3947"\w* when \w ye|strong="H3947"\w* came \w unto|strong="H5414"\w* \w this|strong="H5414"\w* \w place|strong="H5414"\w*, Sihon \w the|strong="H5414"\w* king \w of|strong="H7626"\w* Heshbon, \w and|strong="H3947"\w* Og \w the|strong="H5414"\w* king \w of|strong="H7626"\w* Bashan, came \w out|strong="H5414"\w* against \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w unto|strong="H5414"\w* battle, \w and|strong="H3947"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* smote \w them|strong="H5414"\w*:

\w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* took \w their|strong="H3605"\w* land, \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w gave|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w an|strong="H6213"\w* inheritance \w unto|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Reubenites, \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Gadites, \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* half tribe \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Manassites.

Keep \w therefore|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* words \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H6440"\w* covenant, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w ye|strong="H3117"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* prosper \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w ye|strong="H3117"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w*.

Ye stand \w this|strong="H7130"\w* day \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w before|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H5704"\w* God; \w your|strong="H5704"\w* heads, \w your|strong="H5704"\w* tribes, \w your|strong="H5704"\w* elders, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w your|strong="H5704"\w* officers, \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w men|strong="H4264"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* Israel,

\w your|strong="H3068"\w* little ones, \w your|strong="H3068"\w* wives, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* stranger \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* midst \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* camps, \w from|strong="H3772"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* hewer \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* wood \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* drawer \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* water:

\w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* shouldest enter \w into|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w covenant|strong="H7650"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H6965"\w* God, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w into|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w oath|strong="H7650"\w*, \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H6965"\w* God \w maketh|strong="H6965"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w thee|strong="H1696"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*:

\w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H1285"\w* establish \w thee|strong="H3772"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* day \w unto|strong="H2063"\w* \w himself|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H1285"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H1285"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w unto|strong="H2063"\w* \w thee|strong="H3772"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, as \w he|strong="H3808"\w* spake \w unto|strong="H2063"\w* \w thee|strong="H3772"\w*, \w and|strong="H1285"\w* as \w he|strong="H3808"\w* sware \w unto|strong="H2063"\w* \w thy|strong="H3772"\w* fathers, \w to|strong="H3808"\w* Abraham, \w to|strong="H3808"\w* Isaac, \w and|strong="H1285"\w* \w to|strong="H3808"\w* Jacob.

\w Neither|strong="H5973"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w only|strong="H3588"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w make|strong="H5975"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* covenant \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* oath;

\w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w him|strong="H7130"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* standeth here \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w us|strong="H3045"\w* \w this|strong="H5674"\w* day \w before|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* God, \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w also|strong="H1471"\w* \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w him|strong="H7130"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H4714"\w* \w not|strong="H3045"\w* here \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w us|strong="H3045"\w* \w this|strong="H5674"\w* day:

(\w for|strong="H6086"\w* \w ye|strong="H7200"\w* know how \w we|strong="H3068"\w* dwelt \w in|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* land \w of|strong="H6086"\w* Egypt; \w and|strong="H3701"\w* how \w we|strong="H3068"\w* came \w through|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* midst \w of|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* nations \w through|strong="H7200"\w* \w which|strong="H6086"\w* \w ye|strong="H7200"\w* passed;

\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w ye|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* seen \w their|strong="H3068"\w* abominations, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* idols, wood \w and|strong="H3068"\w* stone, silver \w and|strong="H3068"\w* gold, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H3117"\w* \w among|strong="H5973"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*:)

\w lest|strong="H4616"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* among \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H6771"\w*, \w or|strong="H8085"\w* woman, \w or|strong="H8085"\w* family, \w or|strong="H8085"\w* tribe, whose \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w turneth|strong="H3824"\w* \w away|strong="H3212"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* day \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H1288"\w* God, \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w serve|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* gods \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w those|strong="H8085"\w* nations; \w lest|strong="H4616"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* among \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* root \w that|strong="H3588"\w* beareth gall \w and|strong="H3212"\w* wormwood;

\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w come|strong="H7068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* pass, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* heareth \w the|strong="H3605"\w* words \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* curse, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* bless \w himself|strong="H1931"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* heart, saying, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* peace, \w though|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* walk \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* stubbornness \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w mine|strong="H8478"\w* heart, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w destroy|strong="H4229"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* moist \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* dry:

\w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* pardon \w him|strong="H3605"\w*, \w but|strong="H7451"\w* \w then|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* anger \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* jealousy \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* smoke \w against|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H7451"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* curse \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w book|strong="H5612"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* lie \w upon|strong="H7451"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* blot \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* name \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w under|strong="H3605"\w* heaven.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* separate \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* evil \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H1755"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* tribes \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Israel, according \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H1755"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* curses \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* covenant \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* written \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* book \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* law.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* generation \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w*, \w your|strong="H3068"\w* children \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w rise|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w after|strong="H5927"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* foreigner \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H5927"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w far|strong="H5927"\w* land, \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* say, \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* see \w the|strong="H3605"\w* plagues \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* land, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sicknesses wherewith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H6779"\w* \w it|strong="H5927"\w* sick;

\add and that \add*\w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* land thereof \w is|strong="H3068"\w* brimstone, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* salt, \add and \add*\w a|strong="H3068"\w* burning, \add that \add*\w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* sown, nor beareth, nor \w any|strong="H3605"\w* grass groweth therein, \w like|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* overthrow \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Sodom \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Gomorrah, Admah \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Zeboiim, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* overthrew \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* anger, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* wrath:

\w even|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3772"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* nations \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* say, Wherefore \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* done thus \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* land? \w what|strong="H5921"\w* meaneth \w the|strong="H5921"\w* heat \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* great anger?

\w Then|strong="H3045"\w* men \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* say, Because \w they|strong="H3808"\w* forsook \w the|strong="H5647"\w* covenant \w of|strong="H5647"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H5647"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H5647"\w* \w their|strong="H5647"\w* fathers, which \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w made|strong="H3045"\w* \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w them|strong="H5647"\w* \w when|strong="H3045"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w brought|strong="H3212"\w* \w them|strong="H5647"\w* \w forth|strong="H3212"\w* \w out|strong="H3045"\w* \w of|strong="H5647"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* land \w of|strong="H5647"\w* Egypt;

\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w went|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* served \w other|strong="H2088"\w* gods, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* worshipped \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, gods whom \w they|strong="H3068"\w* knew \w not|strong="H2088"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* whom \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* given \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*:

\w therefore|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w anger|strong="H2534"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* kindled \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* land, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* bring \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H1419"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* curse \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* written \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* book:

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* rooted \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w out|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* land \w in|strong="H3068"\w* anger, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* wrath, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H6213"\w* indignation, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w cast|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w into|strong="H1540"\w* another land, \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* day.

The secret things belong unto the \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* our God: but the things that are revealed belong unto us and to our children for ever, that \w we|strong="H3068"\w* may do all the words of this law.
